verses.html:
1
Search me, O God,
and know my heart today;
Try me, O Saviour,
know my thoughts, I pray.
See if there be
some wicked way in me;
Cleanse me from
ev’ry sin and set me free.

2
I praise Thee, Lord,
for cleansing me from sin;
Fulfill Thy Word and
make me pure within.
Fill me with fire where
once I burned with shame;
Grant my desire
to magnify Thy name.

3
Lord, take my life and
make it wholly Thine;
Fill my poor heart with
Thy great love divine.
Take all my will,
my passion, self, and pride;
I now surrender,
Lord— in me abide.

4
O Holy Spirit,
Revival comes from Thee;
Send a revival—
Start the work in me.
Thy Word declares
Thou wilt supply our need;
For blessings now,
O Lord, I humbly plead.
